message:
In a project I'm working I'm gonna be needing a way to handle incident reports. I think this is a very common feature in a webapp. I need things like being able to customize my report forms, the user can follow discussion, needs to be private for the user, etc.
I have looked into django-helpdesk, great app, but the API and some other things are not very well documented and it needs a little bit of work.
What do you guys use? Is there an easy to integrate web service? should I just embrace django-helpdesk?
